column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " You guys are not gon na believe this !
#Text=" Katara says : " What ?
#Text=How is that possible ?

#Text=" Sokka says : " Listen to this ... " The Boy in the Iceberg is a new production from acclaimed playwright Pu - on Tim , who scoured the globe gathering information on the Avatar , from the icy South Pole to the heart of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" " Zuko says : " Ugh !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Come on , a day at the theater ?
#Text=This is the kind of wacky time - wasting nonsense I 've been missing !
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , uh ... I wanted to sit there .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Just sit next to me .
#Text=What 's the big deal ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I was just , I wanted to ... okay .
#Text=" Toph says : " Why are we sitting in the nosebleed section ?
#Text=My feet ca n't see a thing from up here !
#Text=" Katara says : " Do n't worry , I 'll tell your feet what 's happening .
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " Sokka , my only brother !
#Text=We constantly roam these icy South Pole seas , and yet never do we find anything fulfilling !
#Text=" Actor Sokka says : " All I want is a full feeling in my stomach !
#Text=I 'm starving !
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " Is food the only thing on your mind ?
#Text=" Actor Sokka says : " Well , I 'm trying to it get out of my mind and into my mouth !
#Text=I 'm starving !
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is pathetic !
#Text=My jokes are way funnier than this !
#Text=" Toph says : " I think he 's got you pegged !
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " Every day , the world awaits a beacon to guide us , yet none appears !
#Text=Still , we can not give up hope !
#Text=For hope , is all we have !
#Text=And we must never relinquish it , even ... even to our dying breath !
#Text="
